string-array.name: excuses_names_low
string-array.item: Go to little cousin's birthday party

string-array.name: excuses_names_med
string-array.item: My friend's car broke down and he needs a ride
I have to go on a conference call for work
My boss asked me to come into work

string-array.name: excuses_names_high
string-array.item: A pipe in my house broke
My Mom is in the hospital
